trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The Alligator Turtle can hold its breath for up to 1 hour.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The Alligator Turtle has advantage on {@skill Stealth|XPHB} checks to Hide in water, mud, and swamps.

trait.name: Strong Jaws
entries: If the Alligator Turtle hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with a Bite attack, it can {@action Grapple} the creature in its jaws (escape {@dc 12}). When {@variantrule Grappling|XPHB} a creature it cannot use its Bite attack on other targets.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:5 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage. If it is {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the Alligator Turtle, it takes a bonus {@damage 1d4} damage.

trait.name: Cold-Blooded
entries: When the Anaconda takes cold damage its speed is halved and it cannot take reactions until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Serpentine
entries: The Anaconda counts as two sizes smaller for the purposes of moving through passageways.

trait.name: Thermal Vision
entries: The Anaconda knows the exact location of any warm-blooded creatures within 30 ft. of it.

action.name: Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage. This attack has advantage against creatures {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the Anaconda.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition Grappled|XPHB} (escape {@dc 15}) and {@condition Restrained|XPHB}, and the Anaconda cannot {@action Grapple} another target.

action.name: Crush
entries: The Anaconda forces one creature it is {@variantrule Grappling|XPHB} to make a Strength saving throw ({@dc 15}). On a failure, the creature suffers one level of {@condition Exhaustion|XPHB}.

trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The Aurochs counts as one size larger for the purposes of determining its carrying capacity.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the Aurochs moves at least 20 ft. in a line and hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with a Gore attack, it is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB} and the Aurochs can use a bonus action to make a Stomp attack at it.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The Badger takes the {@action Dash} action, but must end this movement closer to a hostile creature.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: When the Bat makes a {@skill Perception|XPHB} check with its hearing it treats a {@dice d20} roll of 9 or lower as a 10. It loses this benefit and its {@sense Blindsight} if it is {@condition Deafened|XPHB}.

action.name: Bite

trait.name: Thick Hide

entries: When the Boar moves at least 20 ft. in a line and hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with its Tusk attack, it is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}. The Boar can then use its bonus action to use its Stomp against it.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Day)
entries: When the Boar would be reduced to 0 points, but not killed outright, it falls to 1 hit point.

entries: Whenever the Bear takes damage it reduces it by its Constitution modifier (4). Force, psychic, and radiant damage ignore this feature.

bonus.name: Roar of Dominance
entries: After the Bear hits a creature with a Bite or a Claw attack, it can roar, forcing the creature to make a Wisdom saving throw ({@dc 16}), or be {@condition Frightened|XPHB} of the Bear until the start of the Bear's next turn.
Creatures that succeed on this saving throw are immune to the Bear's {@i Roar of Dominance} for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Keen Smell

trait.name: Spotted Camouflage
entries: The Cheetah has advantage on all {@skill Stealth|XPHB} checks to Hide is grasslands.

trait.name: Sprinter

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: If the Chicken falls at least 10 feet it can glide 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it falls. When the Chicken uses this trait, a Medium or smaller creature can hold on to the Chicken's feet to glide along with it.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Opposable Thumbs

action.name: Fist

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The Crab can breathe both air and water.

trait.name: Bottom Feeder
entries: Underwater, the Crab has advantage on {@skill Perception|XPHB} checks to smell creatures within 600 ft. of it that are below their hit point maximum. The Crab also automatically succeeds on {@skill Perception|XPHB} checks to smell dead creatures within 1 mile it is while underwater.

trait.name: Pincer
entries: When the Crab hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with a Claw attack, it can automatically {@action Grapple} the target (escape {@dc 15}). The Crab has two claws, and it can {@action Grapple} one target in each of its claws at a time.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The Crab's attacks deal the maximum damage, in place of rolling, against objects and boats.

trait.name: Underwater Camouflage
entries: While it remains motionless while underwater, the Crab is indistinguishable from its surroundings due to the coral and wreckage on its shell.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The Toad can breath both air and water.

trait.name: Mighty Leap
entries: Once per turn, the Toad can expend 5 feet of its movement long jump up to 30 ft., or a high jump up to 20 ft., even if this exceeds is remaining speed.

trait.name: Strong Jaws
entries: If the Toad hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with its Toxic Bite attack, it can {@action Grapple} the target in its jaws (escape {@dc 15}). While it is {@variantrule Grappling|XPHB} a creature, it cannot use its Toxic Bite attack on other targets.

trait.name: Swallow
entries: When the Toad hits a creature it is {@variantrule Grappling|XPHB} that is at least one size smaller than it with its Toxic Bite, it can swallow it. While swallowed, that creature is {@condition Restrained|XPHB} and {@condition Blinded|XPHB}, it has total cover from attacks and effects outside of the Toad, and it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the Toad's turns.

At the start of each of its turns, the Toad must succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC is the total damage it has taken since the end of its last turn) or a swallowed creature lands {@condition Prone|XPHB} in an unoccupied space within 5 ft.

trait.name: Thick Hide
entries: Whenever the Toad takes damage it reduces it by its Constitution modifier (3). Force, psychic, and radiant damage ignore this feature.

action.name: Toxic Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@dice 2d10 + 5}) piercing plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) poison damage.

action.name: Sticky Tongue
entries: The Toad forces a target it can see within 20 ft. that is at least one size smaller than it to make a Strength saving throw ({@dc 15}). On a failure, the target is pulled to an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of the Toad, then the Toad can use its Toxic Bite attack against it as a bonus action.

This {@condition Exhaustion|XPHB} lasts until the creature can breathe again.

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: If the Beetle ends its turn while flying it falls to the ground, but it takes no falling damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Reflective Carapace
entries: If a creature makes a melee attack against the Beetle, the Beetle can unfurl its reflective wings to impose disadvantage on the triggering attack.

trait.name: Thick Hide
entries: Whenever the Boar takes damage it reduces it by its Constitution modifier (3). Force, psychic, and radiant damage ignore this feature.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: When the Boar moves at least 20 ft. in a line and hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with a Tusk attack, it deals a bonus {@damage 1d6} damage and the target is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}. The Boar can then use a bonus action to make one Stomp against it.

trait.name: Relentless {@recharge 5}
entries: When the Boar is reduced to 0 points, but not killed outright, it falls to 3 hit points.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Tusk
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Imposing Presence
entries: The Bear uses it Strength, in place of Charisma, for {@skill Intimidation|XPHB} checks (included above).

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Bear has advantage on all Wisdom ability checks that incorporate its sense of smell.

trait.name: Strong Jaws
entries: When the Bear hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with its Bite attack, it can Grapple the target in its jaws (escape {@dc 18}). While it is {@variantrule Grappling|XPHB} a creature, it cannot use its Bite attack on other targets.

trait.name: Thick Hide
entries: Whenever the Bear takes damage it reduces it by its Constitution modifier (5). Force, psychic, and radiant damage ignore this feature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Bear makes two attacks, using its Bite and its Claw attacks in any combination.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) slashing damage, and any creature equal to the Bear's size (or smaller) is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

bonus.name: Roar of Dominance
entries: After the Bear hits a creature with a Bite or a Claw attack, it can roar, forcing the creature to make a Wisdom saving throw ({@dc 18}), or be {@condition Frightened|XPHB} of the Bear until the start of the Bear's next turn.
Creatures that succeed on this saving throw are immune to the Bear's {@i Roar of Dominance} for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Venomous {@recharge 5}
entries: If the Centipede hits a target with its Bite attack it can force it to make a Constitution saving throw ({@dc 11}). On a failure, it takes {@damage 3d6} poison damage and is {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}. On a success, it takes half as much poison damage and is not {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}.

A {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the effect ends, but on a failure, it takes {@damage 1d6} poison damage. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this venom is stable, but it is {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} until it regains hit points.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Imposing Presence
entries: The Chicken uses Strength, in place of Charisma, for {@skill Intimidation|XPHB} checks (included above).

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: If the Chicken ends its turn while flying it falls. Whenever it falls at least 10 feet it can glide 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it falls. When using this trait, a Large or smaller creature can hold on to the Chicken's feet to glide along with it.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage. This attack deals a bonus ({@dice 2d6}) damage against {@condition Prone|XPHB} targets.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The Crab can breathe both air and water.

trait.name: Bottom Feeder
entries: Underwater, the Crab has advantage on {@skill Perception|XPHB} checks to smell creatures within 120 feet of it that are below their hit point maximum. The Crab also automatically succeeds on {@skill Perception|XPHB} checks to smell dead creatures within 1 mile it is while underwater.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The Crab has advantage on {@skill Stealth|XPHB} checks to Hide while underwater or when it is covered with sand, mud, or dirt.

trait.name: Pincer
entries: When the Crab hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with its Claw attack it can automatically {@action Grapple} the target (escape {@dc 11}).

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Aquatic Camouflage
entries: While it remains motionless in the water, the Crocodile is indistinguishable from its natural surroundings due to the algae buildup on its scales.

trait.name: Crushing Strength
entries: If the Crocodile damages a creature that is holding its breath underwater, the creature must make a Constitution saving throw ({@dc 16}) or suffer one level of {@condition Exhaustion|XPHB}, which lasts until it comes up for air.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The Crocodile can hold its breath for up to 2 hours while it is underwater.

trait.name: Strong Jaws
entries: When the Crocodile hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with its Bite attack, it can {@action Grapple} the target in its jaws (escape {@dc 18}). While it is {@variantrule Grappling|XPHB} a creature, it cannot use its Bite attack on other targets.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Crocodile makes two attacks, a Bite and a Tail attack. It can replace its Bite attack with Death Roll.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Death Roll
entries: The Crocodile forces one {@condition Grappled|XPHB} creature to make a Strength saving throw ({@dc 16}). It takes ({@dice 4d10}) slashing damage on a failure, and half that on a success.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and a target equal to the Crocodile's size (or smaller) is knocked 10 ft. back in a straight line and falls {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

trait.name: Aquatic
entries: The Electric Eel can only breath underwater.

trait.name: Electrosense
entries: The Electric Eel knows the exact location of any living creature within 90 ft. of it while underwater.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: Opportunity attacks are made at disadvantage against the Electric Eel while it is underwater.

trait.name: Stunning Jolt {@recharge 5}
entries: When the Eel hits a target with its Shocking Bite attack, it can force it to make a Constitution saving throw ({@dc 13}). On a failure, it takes 11 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage and is {@condition Stunned|XPHB} until the end of the Eel's next turn. On a success, it takes half damage and its speed is halved until the start of the Eel's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Eel makes two Shocking Bite attacks.

action.name: Shocking Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d6}) lighting damage, and the creature cannot take reactions until the start of the Eel's next turn.

trait.name: Imposing Presence
entries: The Emu uses Strength, in place of Charisma, for {@skill Intimidation|XPHB} checks (included above).

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Emu has advantage on any attack rolls against hostile targets that are within 5 feet of another conscious creature that is allied with the Emu.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage, and any creature equal to the Emu's size (or smaller) is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The Emu takes the {@action Dash} action, but must end its movement closer to a hostile creature.

bonus.name: Vicious
entries: If the Emu knocks a creature {@condition Prone|XPHB} with its Kick attack, it can make one Beak attack against that target.

trait.name: Aerodynamic
entries: If the Falcon takes the {@action Dash} action while it is flying, its speed triples, and {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks} against it are made with disadvantage until the end of its turn.

trait.name: Dive
entries: If the Falcon moves 40 ft. straight down in a line then hits a target with a Talons attack, it deals a bonus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage on hit. If the target is equal to the Falcon's size (or smaller) it falls {@condition Prone|XPHB} and is {@condition Stunned|XPHB} until the start of the Falcon's next turn.

trait.name: Hunter's Grasp
entries: When the Falcon hits a target at least one size smaller than it with its Talons attack, it can automatically {@action Grapple} the target (escape {@dc 15}).

trait.name: Hunter's Senses
entries: The Falcon adds double its {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus} to its {@skill Perception|XPHB} checks (included above).

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d4 + 5}) piercing damage, and the creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw ({@dc 15}) or it is {@condition Blinded|XPHB} until the start of the Falcon's next turn.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Aquatic
entries: The Fish can only breathe underwater.

trait.name: Bottom Feeder
entries: Underwater, the Fish has advantage on {@skill Perception|XPHB} checks to smell creatures within 120 feet of it that are below their hit point maximum. The Fish also automatically succeeds on {@skill Perception|XPHB} checks to smell dead creatures within 1 mile it is while underwater.

trait.name: Ram
entries: If the Fish moves 20 ft. in a line, then hits a target with its Slam, it rolls one bonus damage die. If the target is Large (or smaller) it is knocked back 20 ft. in a line.

trait.name: Shimmering Camouflage
entries: The Fish has advantage on {@skill Stealth|XPHB} checks to hide while it is underwater.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The Frog can breath both air and water.

trait.name: Mighty Leap
entries: Once per turn, the Frog can expend 5 feet of its movement long jump up to 20 feet, or high jump up to 10 feet, even if this exceeds is remaining speed.

trait.name: Swallow
entries: If the Frog hits a creature it is {@variantrule Grappling|XPHB} with a Bite attack, it can swallow it. While swallowed, a creature is {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Restrained|XPHB}, it has total cover from attacks and effects outside of the Frog, and it takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) acid damage at the start of each of the Frog's turns.

At the start of each of its turns, the Frog must succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC is the total damage it has taken since the end of its last turn) or a swallowed creature lands {@condition Prone|XPHB} in an unoccupied space within 5 ft.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage, and a target smaller than the Frog is {@condition Grappled|XPHB} (escape {@dc 12}) and {@condition Restrained|XPHB}, and the Frog cannot Bite another target.

trait.name: Ram
entries: When the Goat moves at least 20 ft. in a straight line, then hits a creature with a Headbutt attack, it rolls one bonus damage die, and if the target is equal to the Goats size or smaller it is knocked back 25 ft. in a line.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The Goat has advantage on saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB} or moved against its will.

action.name: Headbutt
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Concussive Blow
entries: Once per turn, when the Gorilla hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with a Fist attack, it can force it to make a Constitution saving throw ({@dc 17}) or be {@condition Stunned|XPHB} until the start of the Gorilla's next turn.

trait.name: Imposing Presence
entries: The Gorilla uses its Strength, in place of Charisma, for {@skill Intimidation|XPHB} checks (included above).

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Gorilla has advantage on all Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sense of smell.

trait.name: Savage Fury {@recharge 4}
entries: At the start of its turn, the Gorilla flies into a Fury which lasts until the start of its next turn. For the duration, it has advantage on all Strength attacks, checks, and saving throws, but all attacks against it have advantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Gorilla uses its Intimidating Show, then it makes two First or Hurl attacks in any combination.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hurl
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. It throws one Medium (or smaller) object or creature it is holding.

action.name: Intimidating Show
entries: The Gorilla forces hostile creatures that can see or hear it within 30 ft. to make a Wisdom saving throw ({@dc 17}). On a failed save, they are {@condition Frightened|XPHB} of the Gorilla for 1 minute. Creatures repeat this saving throw at the end of their turn, ending the effect on a success.
Creatures that succeed on this saving throw are immune to the Gorilla's {@i Intimidating Show} for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Airborne Evasion
entries: When the Hawk is forced to make a Dexterity saving throw to avoid damage while flying, it takes no damage on a success, and half on a failure.

trait.name: Hunter's Grasp
entries: When the Hawk hits a target at least one size smaller than it with a Talons attack, it can choose to automatically {@action Grapple} the target (escape {@dc 13}).

trait.name: Hunter's Senses
entries: The Hawk adds double its {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus} to its {@skill Perception|XPHB} checks (included above).

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Hawk has advantage on attack rolls against hostile targets that are within 5 feet of another conscious creature that is allied with the Hawk.

action.name: Beak

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Ambush Hunter
entries: The Heron has advantage on {@skill Stealth|XPHB} checks to {@action Hide} in marshes and swamps, and creatures have disadvantage on any ability check made to detect the Heron while it is standing still.

trait.name: Ambush Strike
entries: If the Heron hits a creature with its Beak attack while it is unaware of the Heron, the attack deals a bonus 14 ({@damage 3d8}) damage on hit.

trait.name: Hunter's Grasp
entries: If the Heron hits a target at least one size smaller than it with its Talons attack, it can choose to automatically {@action Grapple} the target (escape {@dc 14}).

trait.name: Hunter's Senses
entries: The Heron adds double its {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus} to its {@skill Perception|XPHB} checks (included above).

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Cold-Blooded
entries: If the Lizard takes cold damage its speed is halved and it cannot take reactions until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The Lizard has advantage on {@skill Stealth|XPHB} checks to Hide in natural environments.

trait.name: Sticky Grip
entries: The Lizard can climb up sheer surfaces and upside down without making an ability check.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Shed Tail (1/Day)
entries: When the Lizard is {@condition Grappled|XPHB} or takes damage it can shed its tail to automatically escape from the Grapple or reduce the triggering damage to 0.

trait.name: Aquatic
entries: The Octopus can only breathe underwater.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The Octopus can hold its breath for up to 1 hour while it is out of the water.

trait.name: Oozing Form
entries: The Octopus can move through gaps as narrow as 3-inches wide without having to squeeze.

trait.name: Underwater Camouflage
entries: The Octopus has advantage on {@skill Stealth|XPHB} checks made to Hide while it is underwater.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is equal to the Octopus' size (or smaller) then it is automatially {@condition Grappled|XPHB} (escape {@dc 13}), and the Octopus cannot attack other targets with that tentacle.

reaction.name: Ink Cloud (1/Short or long rest)
entries: When the Octopus is targeted by an attack it can see while it is underwater, it can fill its space with ink, then move up to its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks}. The ink heavily obscures its space for 1 minute or until it is dispersed.

trait.name: Hunter's Grasp
entries: When the Owl hits a target at least one size smaller than it with its Talons attack, it can choose to automatically {@action Grapple} the target (escape {@dc 11}).

trait.name: Hunter's Senses
entries: The Owl adds double its {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus} to its {@skill Perception|XPHB} checks (included above).

trait.name: Nocturnal Hunter
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the Owl has advantage on {@skill Stealth|XPHB} checks and it does not provoke {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks} when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Rodent has advantage on all Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sense of smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Rodent has advantage on attack rolls against hostile targets that are within 5 feet of another conscious creature that is allied with the Rodent.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Scamper
entries: The Rodent can {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide}.

trait.name: Pincer
entries: If the Scorpion hits a target equal to its size (or smaller) with its Claw attack it can automatically {@action Grapple} it (escape {@dc 13}). The Scorpion has two Claws and each can only Grapple one target at a time.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Scorpion makes three attacks, one with each of its Claws, then one with its Stinger.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must make a Constitution saving throw ({@dc 13}) or it takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) poison damage and become {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} until the start of the Scorpion's next turn.

trait.name: Aquatic
entries: The Shark can only breathe underwater.

trait.name: Blood Sense
entries: The Shark knows the direction of any creature with less than its maximum hit points within 10 miles, so long as they are in the same body of water.

trait.name: Frenzy
entries: The Shark has advantage on Bite attacks against creatures with less than their maximum hit points.

trait.name: Relentless {@recharge 4}
entries: If the Shark is reduced to 0 points, but not killed, it falls to 11 ({@dice 1d12 + 5}) hit points.

trait.name: Swallow
entries: Any creature that is Swallowed by the Shark is {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Restrained|XPHB}, it has total cover from all outside attacks and effects outside the Shark, and it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the Shark's turns.

At the start of each of its turns, the Shark must succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC is the total damage it has taken since its previous turn) or swallowed creatures land {@condition Prone|XPHB} in an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of it.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}34 ({@damage 5d10 + 6}) piercing damage, and a target that is two sizes smaller than it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw ({@dc 17}) or be Swallowed.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Sloth has advantage on Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sense of smell.

trait.name: Lumbering
entries: The Sloth has disadvantage on all Dexterity ability checks and saving throws, and it cannot Dash.

trait.name: Thick Hide
entries: Whenever the Sloth takes damage it reduces it by its Constitution modifier (3). Force, psychic, and radiant damage ignore this feature.

trait.name: Tropical Camouflage
entries: While it remains motionless in a jungle environment, the Sloth is indistinguishable from its surroundings due to the moss growing from its fur.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Sloth makes two Claw attacks. It can replace one of these with a Fetid Bite attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and a target smaller than the Sloth is knocked back 10 ft. and must make a Dexterity saving throw ({@dc 17}) or fall {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

action.name: Fetid Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage, and it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw ({@dc 17}) or it is {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} until the start of the Sloth's next turn.

trait.name: Hive Mind
entries: For each additional {@b Soldier Ant} or {@b Ant Queen} within 30 ft., the Soldier Ant gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws (maximum +10).

trait.name: Strong Jaws
entries: When the Soldier Ant hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with a Bite attack, it can {@action Grapple} the target in its jaws (escape {@dc 12}). When {@variantrule Grappling|XPHB} a creature it cannot use its Bite attack on other targets.

trait.name: Worker
entries: The Soldier Ant counts as two sizes larger for the purpose of its carrying capacity and the amount of weight it can push, pull, drag, or lift at once. Its speed is also not halved while it is {@variantrule Grappling|XPHB} a creature.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Arachnid
entries: The Spider can climb sheer surfaces, upside down, and along webs without an ability check. It also ignores movement restrictions caused by webs and it can sense other creatures touching the same web as it.

trait.name: Bind
entries: When the Spider targets a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with {@spell Web|XPHB}, the target must make a Dexterity saving throw ({@dc 12}) or it is covered in webbing and its speed becomes 0. As an action, a webbed creature can make a Strength check, escaping the web on a success.

trait.name: Venomous {@recharge 5}
entries: If the Spider hits a creature with its Bite attack it can force it to make a Constitution saving throw ({@dc 12}). On a failure it takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage and is {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}.

A {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the effect ends, but on a failure, it takes {@damage 1d8} poison damage. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this venom is stable, but it is {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} until it regains hit points.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Web Strand
entries: The Spider shoots a thin strand of webbing at a target it can see within 30 ft., forming a continuous line of webbing from where it is standing to the target.

entries: The Squid can only breathe underwater.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The Squid's attacks deal maximum damage, in place of rolling, against objects and boats.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Squid makes two attacks using its Bite and Tentacle attack in any combination.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is equal to the Squid's size (or smaller) then it can automatically {@action Grapple} its target (escape {@dc 17}).

reaction.name: Ink Cloud (1/Short or long rest)
entries: When the Squid is targeted by an attack it can see while it is underwater, it can fill its space with ink, then move up to its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks}. The ink heavily obscures its space for 1 minute or until it is dispersed.

trait.name: Cervine Leap
entries: The Stag can long jump up to 40 ft. and high jump up to 25 ft. with only 10 ft. running start.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: When the Stag moves at least 20 ft. in a line and hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with its Antler attack, it is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB} and the Stag can use a bonus action to use its Hooves against it.

action.name: Antler
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Kick
entries: When a creature the Stag can see enters its reach, the Stag can make one Hooves attack against it.

trait.name: Imposing Presence

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: If the Beetle ends its turn while flying it falls to the ground, but it takes no falling damage.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the Beetle moves at least 20 ft. in a line and hits with a Gore attack, it deals a bonus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) damage, and if the target was equal to the Beetle's size (or smaller), it is also knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

action.name: Gore

reaction.name: Reflective Carapace

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The Toad can breath both air and water.

trait.name: Mighty Leap
entries: Once per turn, the Toad can expend 5 feet of its movement long jump up to 20 feet, or high jump up to 10 feet, even if this exceeds is remaining speed.

trait.name: Strong Jaws
entries: If the Toad hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with its Toxic Bite attack, it can {@action Grapple} the target in its jaws (escape {@dc 13}). While it is {@variantrule Grappling|XPHB} a creature, it cannot use its Toxic Bite attack on other targets.

trait.name: Swallow
entries: When the Toad hits a creature it is {@variantrule Grappling|XPHB} that is at least one size smaller than it with its Toxic Bite, it can swallow it. While swallowed, that creature is {@condition Restrained|XPHB} and {@condition Blinded|XPHB}, it has total cover from attacks and effects outside of the Toad, and it takes 11 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the Toad's turns.

At the start of each of its turns, the Toad must succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC is the total damage it has taken since the end of its last turn) or a swallowed creature lands {@condition Prone|XPHB} in an unoccupied space within 5 ft.

action.name: Toxic Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@dice 1d10 + 2}) piercing plus 6 ({@damage 1d10}) poison damage.

action.name: Sticky Tongue
entries: The Toad forces a target it can see within 15 ft. that is at least one size smaller than it to make a Strength saving throw ({@dc 12}). On a failure, the target is pulled to an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of the Toad, then the Toad can use its Toxic Bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Thick Hide
entries: Whenever the Tortoise takes damage it can reduce it by its Constitution modifier (3). Force, psychic, and radiant damage ignore this feature.

action.name: Bite

action.name: Withdraw

trait.name: Carrion Sense

trait.name: Hunter's Grasp

trait.name: Keen Sight & Smell

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Vulture has advantage on attack rolls against hostile targets that are within 5 feet of another conscious creature that is allied with the Vulture.

A {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the effect ends, but on a failure, it takes {@damage 1d6} poison damage. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this venom is stable, but it is {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} until it regains hit points.

A {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the effect ends, but on a failure, it takes 4 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this venom is stable, but it is {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} until it regains hit points.

entries: The Ox counts as one size larger for the purposes of determining its carrying capacity.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the Ox moves 20 ft. in a line, then hits a target with its Gore, and if the target is equal to the Ox in size (or smaller) it is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Panther has advantage on all Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sense of smell.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the Panther moves 20 ft. in a line, then hits a target equal to its size (or smaller) with its Claw attack, it is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}. If it falls {@condition Prone|XPHB}, the Panther can then use its bonus action to make one Bite attack against it.

trait.name: Twilight Camouflage
entries: The Panther has advantage on all {@skill Stealth|XPHB} checks while it is in dim light or darkness.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: The Bear can move across and climb icy surfaces without making an ability check. Additionally, the Bear can ignore {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB} imposed by ice or snow.

trait.name: Imposing Presence
entries: The Bear uses its Strength, in place of Charisma, for {@skill Intimidation|XPHB} checks (included above).

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Bear has advantage on all Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sense of smell.

trait.name: Strong Jaws
entries: When the Bear hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with its Bite attack, it can {@action Grapple} the target in its jaws (escape {@dc 14}). While it is {@variantrule Grappling|XPHB} a creature, it cannot use its Bite attack on other targets.

trait.name: Thick Hide
entries: Whenever the Bear takes damage it reduces it by its Constitution modifier (3). Force, psychic, and radiant damage ignore this feature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Bear makes two attacks, using its Bite and its Claw attacks in any combination.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage, and any creature equal to the Bear's size (or smaller) is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The Bear takes the {@action Dash} action, but it must end its movement closer to a hostile creature.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The Raven can perfectly mimic simple sounds it has heard, like a person's voice or an animal chittering. A successful {@dc 10} {@skill Insight|XPHB} check reveals this mimicry.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Aquatic
entries: The Reef Shark can only breathe underwater.

trait.name: Blood Sense
entries: The Reef Shark knows the direction of any creature with less than its maximum hit points within 1 mile, so long as they are in the same body of water.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Opportunist
entries: When a creature the Reef Shark can sense within 30 feet is hit by an attack, the Reef Shark moves up to half its speed and makes one Bite attack against it.

trait.name: Imposing Presence
entries: The Rhinoceros uses its Strength, in place of Charisma, for {@skill Intimidation|XPHB} checks (see above).

trait.name: Thick Hide
entries: Whenever the Rhinoceros takes damage it reduces it by its Constitution modifier (2). Force, psychic, and radiant damage ignore this feature.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the Rhinoceros moves at least 20 ft. in a line and hits with a Gore attack, it deals a bonus {@damage 1d8} damage. If the target is equal to the Rhinoeros's size (or smaller), it is also knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}, and the Rhinoceros can use a bonus action to use its Stomp attack on it.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Rodent has advantage on all Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sense of smell.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Scamper
entries: The Rodent can {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide}.

trait.name: Airborne Evasion
entries: When the Eagle is forced to make a Dexterity saving throw to avoid damage while flying, it takes no damage on a success, and half on a failure.

trait.name: Hunter's Grasp
entries: When the Eagle hits a target at least one size smaller than it with its Talons attack, it can choose to automatically {@action Grapple} the target (escape {@dc 15}).

trait.name: Hunter's Senses
entries: The Eagle adds double its {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus} to its {@skill Perception|XPHB} checks (included above).

trait.name: Swift Wing
entries: {@action Opportunity attack||Opportunity attacks} against the Eagle have disadvantage while it is using its flying speed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Eagle uses its Screech (if available), then makes two Beak or Talons attacks in any combination.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage, and the creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw ({@dc 17}) or it is {@condition Blinded|XPHB} until the start of the Eagle's next turn.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) slashing damage, and the target has disadvantage on attack rolls against all targets other than the Eagle until the start of the Eagle's next turn.

action.name: Screech {@recharge 4}
entries: The Eagle forces hostile targets that can see or hear it within 120 ft. to make a Wisdom saving throw ({@dc 17}). On a failure, they are {@condition Frightened|XPHB} of the Eagle for 1 minute. They repeat the saving throw at the end of their turn, ending the effect on a success.
Creatures that succeed on this Wisdom saving throw are immune to the Eagle's {@i Screech} for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Tiger has advantage on Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sense of smell.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: When the Tiger moves 20 ft. in a line, then hits a target equal to its size (or smaller) with its Claw attack, it is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}. If it falls {@condition Prone|XPHB}, the Tiger can then use its bonus action to make one Bite attack against it.

trait.name: Stalker
entries: The Tiger adds double its {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus} to {@skill Stealth} checks (included above).

trait.name: Strong Jaws
entries: When the Tiger hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with its Bite attack, it can {@action Grapple} the target in its jaws (escape {@dc 14}). While it is {@variantrule Grappling|XPHB} a creature, it cannot use its Bite attack on other targets.
Any creature that starts its turn {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the Tiger in this way takes {@damage 1d6} slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Pincer
entries: If the Scorpion hits a target with its Claw attack it can automatically {@action Grapple} the target (escape {@dc 6}). If the target is larger than the Scorpion, its speed isn't reduced to 0, but the Scorpion automatically moves with it.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1}) piercing damage. On hit, the target must make a Constitution saving throw ({@dc 9}) or it takes {@damage 1d6} poison damage and is {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} until its next turn ends.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: If the Whale makes a {@skill Perception|XPHB} check with its hearing it treats a {@dice d20} roll of 9 or lower as a 10. It loses this benefit and its Blindsight if it is {@condition Deafened|XPHB}.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The Whale can hold its breath for up to 2 hours while it is underwater.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The Whale's attacks deal maximum damage, in place of rolling, against objects and boats.

trait.name: Swallow
entries: Any creature that is Swallowed by the Whale is {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Restrained|XPHB}, it has total cover from all outside attacks and effects, and it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the Whale's turns.

At the start of each of its turns, the Whale must succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC is the total damage it has taken since its previous turn) or swallowed creatures land {@condition Prone|XPHB} in an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of it.

trait.name: Thick Hide
entries: Whenever the Whale takes damage it reduces it by its Constitution modifier (5). Force, psychic, and radiant damage ignore this feature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Whale makes two attacks using its Bite and Tail attacks in any combination.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) piercing damage, and if the target is two sizes smaller than the Whale, it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw ({@dc 19}) or it is Swallowed.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage, and a target equal to the Whale's size (or smaller) is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

trait.name: Arachnid
entries: The Spider can climb sheer surfaces, upside down, and along webs without an ability check. It also ignores movement restrictions caused by webs and it can sense other creatures touching the same web as it.

trait.name: Venomous {@recharge 5}
entries: If the Spider hits a creature with its Bite attack it can force it to make a Constitution saving throw ({@dc 9}). On a failure it is {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}.

A {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the effect ends, but on a failure, it takes {@damage 1d4} poison damage. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this venom is stable, but it is {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} until it regains hit points.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Web Strand
entries: The Spider shoots a thin strand of webbing at a target it can see within 10 ft., forming a continuous line of webbing from where it is standing to the target.

trait.name: Cervine Leap
entries: The Stag can long jump up to 30 ft. and high jump up to 15 ft. with only 10 ft. running start.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: When the Stag moves at least 20 ft. in a line and hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with its Antler attack, it is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB} and the Stag can use a bonus action to use its Hooves against it.

action.name: Antler
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Kick
entries: When a creature the Stag can see enters its reach, the Stag can make one Hooves attack against it.

trait.name: Imposing Presence
entries: The Terror Bird uses Strength, in place of Charisma, for {@skill Intimidation|XPHB} checks (see above).

trait.name: Mighty Leap
entries: Once per turn, the Terror Bird can expend 5 ft. of its movement to long jump up to 30 ft., or high jump to 20 ft., even if this exceeds is remaining speed.

trait.name: Strong Jaws
entries: If the Terror Bird hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with a Beak attack, it can {@action Grapple} it in its beak (escape {@dc 16}).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Terror Bird makes two attacks, using its Beak and Kick in any combination.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage, and a target equal to the Terror Bird's size (or smaller) is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The Terror Bird takes the Dash action, but it must end its movement closer to a hostile creature.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Tiger has advantage on Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sense of smell.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: When the Tiger moves 20 ft. in a line, then hits a target equal to its size (or smaller) with its Claw attack, it is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}. If it falls {@condition Prone|XPHB}, the Tiger can then use its bonus action to make one Bite attack against it.

trait.name: Stalker
entries: The Tiger adds double its {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus} to {@skill Stealth} checks (included above).

trait.name: Strong Jaws
entries: When the Tiger hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with its Bite attack, it can {@action Grapple} the target in its jaws (escape {@dc 13}). While it is {@variantrule Grappling|XPHB} a creature, it cannot use its Bite attack on other targets.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Cold-Blooded
entries: When the Titanoboa takes cold damage its speed is halved and it cannot take reactions until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Serpentine
entries: The Titanoboa counts as two sizes smaller for the purposes of moving through passageways.

trait.name: Thermal Vision
entries: The Titanoboa knows the exact location of any warm-blooded creatures within 90 ft. of it.

trait.name: Swallow
entries: If the Titanoboa hits a {@condition Grappled|XPHB} creature that is at least one size smaller than it with a Strike attack, it swallows it. A swallowed creature is {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Restrained|XPHB}, has total cover from outside attacks and effects, and it takes 18 ({@damage 5d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the Titanoboa's turns.

At the start of its turn, the Titanoboa must succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC is the total damage it has taken since its previous turn) or any swallowed creatures land {@condition Prone|XPHB} in an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of it.

action.name: Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) piercing damage. This attack has advantage against creatures {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the Titanoboa.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition Grappled|XPHB} (escape {@dc 17}) and {@condition Restrained|XPHB}. If a creature ends its turn {@condition Grappled|XPHB} this way, it suffers one level of {@condition Exhaustion|XPHB}.

trait.name: Sturdy
entries: The Tortoise has advantage on saving throws to resist being moved against its will.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1}) slashing damage.

action.name: Withdraw
entries: The Tortoise recedes into its shell gaining a +2 bonus to its {@variantrule Armor Class|XPHB} but its speed becomes 0. As an action, it can emerge and return to normal.

trait.name: Cold-Blooded
entries: When the Viper takes cold damage its speed is halved and it cannot take reactions until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Thermal Vision
entries: The Viper knows the exact location of any warm-blooded creatures within 30 feet of it.

trait.name: Venomous {@recharge 5}
entries: If the Viper hits a creature with a Strike attack it can force it to make a Constitution saving throw ({@dc 10}). On a failure, the creature takes {@damage 2d4} poison damage and is {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}.
A {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the effect ends, but on a failure, it takes an additional {@damage 1d4} poison damage.

action.name: Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Carrion Sense
entries: The Vulture has advantage on {@skill Perception|XPHB} checks to smell creatures within 120 ft. that are below their hit point maximum. It automatically succeeds on {@skill Perception|XPHB} checks to smell dead creatures within 1 mile.

trait.name: Keen Sight & Smell
entries: The Vulture has advantage on all Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sight or smell.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Opportunist
entries: When a creature within 30 feet that the Vulture can see is hit by an attack, the Vulture can move up to half its speed and make a Beak attack against it.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The Walrus can hold its breath for up to 30 minutes while it is underwater.

trait.name: Thick Hide
entries: Whenever the Walrus takes damage it can reduce it by its Constitution modifier (2). Force, psychic, and radiant damage ignore this feature.

action.name: Tusk
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage, and if the target is smaller than the Walrus, its speed is halved until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Keen Hearing & Smell
entries: The Wild Dog has advantage on Wisdom ability checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Wild Dog has advantage on attack rolls against hostile targets that are within 5 feet of another conscious creature that is allied with the Wild Dog.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Opportunist
entries: When a creature that the Wild Dog can see within 30 feet is hit by an attack, the Wild Dog moves up to half its speed and make a Bite attack against it.

trait.name: Keen Hearing & Smell
entries: The Wolf has advantage on any Wisdom ability checks that rely on its hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Wolf has advantage on attack rolls against hostile targets that are within 5 feet of another conscious creature that is allied with the Wolf.

trait.name: Strong Jaws
entries: If the Wolf hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with a Bite attack, it can {@action Grapple} the target in its jaws (escape {@dc 11}). When {@variantrule Grappling|XPHB} a creature it cannot use its Bite attack on other targets.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

monsterFluff.name: CR 0
entries: Beasts of Challenge Rating 0 include the most common and plentiful Beasts that exist on the Material Plane. Beasts of CR 0 are not a threat unless encountered in large groups.

When a creature casts the {@spell find familiar} spell, they can also select {@filter any CR 0 Beast from this Compendium|bestiary|source=llcompendiumofbeasts|Challenge Rating=[&0]|type=beast}, in addition to the normal options included with the {@spell find familiar} spell.

items.name: Reskinning Beast Statblocks
entries: Many of the stat blocks in this Compendium can be used to represent multiple Beasts.
For example, the {@creature Raven|LLCompendiumOfBeasts} stat block can be used for songbirds, parrots, or other birds.
Similarly, the {@creature Rodent|LLCompendiumOfBeasts} stat block can be used to represent the multitude of small furry mammals: mice, rats, squirrels, hedgehogs, ferrets, etc.

monsterFluff.name: CR 1
entries: Beasts of Challenge Rating 1 are apex predators or massive herd animals. Beasts of this CR make formidable enemies by themselves for a group of inexperienced adventurers.

monsterFluff.name: CR 2
entries: Beasts of Challenge Rating 2 are highly dangerous monsters which inspire myth and legend amongst the common people. These Beasts are deadly to all but the most skilled hunters.

monsterFluff.name: CR 3
entries: Beasts of Challenge Rating 3 are massive and extremely rare Beasts which dominate their chosen habitat. When commonfolk venture into their lairs they are never heard from again.

monsterFluff.name: CR 4
entries: Beasts of Challenge Rating 4 inspire myth and legend when travelers tell tales about them. These Beasts can challenge the most skilled local hunters and adventuring parties.

monsterFluff.name: CR 5
entries: Beasts of Challenge Rating 5 are titans of the natural world and often embody the destructive and wild wrath of nature.

monsterFluff.name: CR 6
entries: Beasts of Challenge Rating 6 sit at the apex of the animal kingdom. They are the most powerful Beasts that roam the wilds short of those empowered by primal forces or magic.

monsterFluff.name: CR
entries: Beasts of Challenge Rating  include large and potentially dangerous herbivores, along with small predators which are deadly to common folk, and pose a risk to adventurers.

monsterFluff.name: CR
entries: Beasts of Challenge Rating  include the most powerful domesticated animals and deadly hunters in their habitat.

monsterFluff.name: CR
entries: Beasts of Challenge Rating  include common Beasts that are hardy, trainable by humanoids, or potentially dangerous should they catch a group of adventurers unaware.

items: {@i Legends tell of a powerful fey creature spoken of in whispers as the {@creature Laser Llama|LLLaserLlama} {@note ({@link Original URL|https://www.gmbinder.com/share/-O7o2cNFhle7UKgXAMkk})}. The legends say this mythical llama can fly and conjure blasts of pure radiance to smite its foes...}

variantrule.name: New Rules for Beasts
entries: Multiple creatures included in the {@book laserllama compendium of Beasts|LLCompendiumOfBeasts} use the new and alternate rules detailed below:

entries.name: Adjusted Challenge Ratings
entries: {@variantrule Challenge Rating|XPHB|Challenge Ratings (CR)} have been updated to reflect the threat that such a Beast would pose to four adventurers of that level.

entries.name: Beast Subtypes
entries: Like other types of monsters (notably fiends), the Beasts here now each have one of the following subtypes: {@i Aquatic, Avian,Brute, Carnivore, Reptilian,} or {@i Vermin}.
Though, legends speak of extinct Beasts that might exist in the remote parts of the wild world with the {@i Ancient} subtype.

entries.name: Recharge Features
entries: If you use a feature to take on the shape of a creature with a Recharge feature (either on a {@dice d6} roll of 5–6 or after a short or long rest), you do not regain the use of that feature until thespecified recharge condition is met, even if you revert to yournormal form then take on the shape of that creature again.

entries.name: Size: Diminutive
entries: Diminutive is a new size category for creatures smaller than Tiny. Diminutive creatures are smaller than 1 foot  1 foot, and include vermin, rodents, insects, and other small creatures.

If you use a feature to take on the shape of a Diminutive creature, such as the {@spell polymorph|}{@sup LL} spell or the {@class Druid|XPHB|Druid's} {@classFeature Wild Shape|Druid|XPHB|2|XPHB}, you immediately revert to your normal form when you take any amount of damage or when you fail a saving throw.
{@style Unleash Wild Fury with this Compendium of Alternate Beasts for the World's Greatest Roleplaying Game|dnd-font;large}

The Beasts included here have been redesigned to be more dynamic in play.
